title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1646-7.9 - Schedule of investments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1646-7.9 - Schedule of investments

State Regulations

Where a local agency has made investments, monthly and
quarterly financial report submitted shall include a detailed schedule of
investments, prepared in accordance with the instructions given in section
1645-5.1. The schedule of
investments shall not include investments made by the State Comptroller of loan
funds held by him in the State Housing Fund. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1646-7.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
